posts.post_content:
This card can actually be pretty good, you just have to go through a few steps:  
  
1) Play [Storm Crow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Storm Crow) during Turn 2  
  
2) Play [Moonlace](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Moonlace) on Storm Crow.  
  
3) Swing out with Storm Crow for flying *colorless* damage.  
  
  
  
The game is as good as over.
posts.html:

2) Play Moonlace on Storm Crow.

3) Swing out with Storm Crow for flying colorless damage.



The game is as good as over.

deck list to show noobs the power of **STORMCROW!!!!!**   
  
12 [Storm Crow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Storm Crow)  
4 [Sword of Light and Shadow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sword of Light and Shadow)  
4 [Sword of Fire and Ice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sword of Fire and Ice)  
2 [Umezawa's Jitte](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Umezawa's Jitte)  
4 [Whispersilk Cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Whispersilk Cloak)  
4 [Cranial Plating](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cranial Plating)  
2 [Mindslaver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mindslaver)  
4 [Loxodon Warhammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Loxodon Warhammer)  
4 [Sword of Vengeance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sword of Vengeance)  
4 [Blade of the Bloodchief](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blade of the Bloodchief)

2 [Mirror Gallery](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mirror Gallery)

Posted By: mr8658 (6/7/2013 10:52:47 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@RetroGamer3  
What? That's not it at all.  
  
This card is rated so high because it is the strongest card ever printed. It has so many versatile uses.  
  
@at0micpickle  
It's a 1/2 **flying** for 2. You will never understand the power of storm crow.  
  
Better power/toughness than [tarmogoyf](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=tarmogoyf) when the graveyards are empty, and it has flying. That's ridiculous. It even trades with [dark confidant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=dark confidant). Better stats than [arcbound ravager](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=arcbound ravager) as well.  
  
Those are some of the best 2-drops in the entire game. They can't even touch this. They don't even have flying.  
  
EDIT  
Another note:  
This card is legal in modern, but wasn't reprinted in modern masters, but the above cards I mentioned were. It's because this card is too powerful to be printed again.

posts.post_content:
People keep complaining about and mocking this card. It's getting exhausting to remind them that *you get a copy of Crow for each spell that has been played that turn.*  
  
Sure, a 1/2 flier for ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol) is mediocre, but with a few cantrips, Crow can easily outclass Squadron Hawk. Five or more 1/2 fliers for one card? Now you're talking.  
  
Storm is a broken mechanic, and Crow is the best Storm card.  
  
;)
posts.html:
People keep complaining about and mocking this card. It's getting exhausting to remind them that you get a copy of Crow for each spell that has been played that turn.

Sure, a 1/2 flier for is mediocre, but with a few cantrips, Crow can easily outclass Squadron Hawk. Five or more 1/2 fliers for one card? Now you're talking.

Storm is a broken mechanic, and Crow is the best Storm card.
